title: useIntersectionObserver( )
description: The `useIntersectionObserver` hook facilitates tracking the visibility of a specified DOM element using the Intersection Observer API. In this article, you'll find practical code implementations and real-world use cases, demonstrating how the custom hook can be applied in various scenarios. We'll break down the process of creating the hook, explain its key features, and provide a detailed explanation to help you understand its functionality and use.
